item.title: Ranking. help with error
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I got this code ( Delta based).
if i compile i get error at " totalz ".

if (totalz >= server.Rank1)
{
playerRank = 1;
server.Rank1 = totalz;
}
if (totalz >= server.Rank2 && totalz < server.Rank1)
{
playerRank = 2;
server.Rank2 = totalz;
}

if (totalz >= server.Rank3 && totalz < server.Rank2)
{
playerRank = 3;
server.Rank3 = totalz;
}

{
